This knowledge can lead to enhancing online customer experience and broadening the range of products offered.

In summary, the information on this slide provides insights into channel performance and consumer preferences in the luxury market, which can be used to strategize investments, optimize channel mix, and adapt to market trends to improve business outcomes.
